snippet: Not long ago, Cuban-Americans in Miami rolled out the red carpet only to defectors who disavowed their homeland. But a dissident who plans to return home has been greeted warmly.
abstract: Yoani Sanchez, Cuban dissident whose trenchant blog and Twitter posts have made her cause celebre for democracy on the island, has found warm welcome from other Cuban exiles in Miami; she will return to Cuba to join her husband and son, and has offered up an alternative narrative for both the disenchanted in Cuba and the hopeful in Miami, one forged over the Internet.
lead_paragraph: Not long ago, Cuban-Americans in Miami rolled out the red carpet only to defectors who disavowed their homeland. But a dissident who plans to return home has been greeted warmly.

headline.seo: Yoani Sánchez, Cuban Dissident, Welcomed in Miami
headline.main: New Breed of Cuban Dissident Finds Changed Miami
headline.print_headline: New Breed of Cuban Dissident Finds Changed Miami

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
